What We Offer

End-to-End Manufacturing

From concept to cartridge, we handle every step of the physical production process.

Cartridge Production

Custom PCB design and assembly for NES, SNES, Game Boy, Genesis and more. Premium quality chips and components.

Packaging & Boxes

Professional retail boxes, clamshell cases, and custom packaging. Full-color printing on premium materials.

Manuals & Inserts

Full-color instruction manuals, warranty cards, and promotional inserts. Various sizes and paper options.

Label Printing

High-quality cartridge labels with glossy or matte finishes. Weatherproof and fade-resistant.

QA & Testing

Every unit tested on original hardware. Compatibility verified across different console revisions.

Fulfillment

Worldwide shipping with tracking. We can ship directly to your customers or in bulk to you.

How It Works

From ROM to Retail

A streamlined process designed to get your game into players hands with minimal hassle.

Step 1

Request a Quote

Tell us about your game, platform, and desired run size. We will provide a detailed estimate within 24 hours.

Step 2

Design & Proofs

Work with our design team on labels, manuals, and packaging. We provide digital proofs for your approval.

Step 3

Production

PCB assembly, cartridge programming, label application, and packaging assembly. Full quality control at every step.

Step 4

Testing

Every unit tested on original hardware. We verify functionality, save compatibility, and visual quality.

Step 5

Delivery

Shipped to you or directly to your customers. Worldwide delivery with tracking and insurance.

Step 6

Support

We stand behind our work. If any issues arise, we are here to help with replacements or troubleshooting.
